name: gist-sync-file-action
description: GitHub action that syncs between a local file and a gist

scripts.prepare: ncc build index.js -o dist --source-map --license licenses.txt && npm run convertCLRFtoLF
scripts.convertCLRFtoLF: tr -d '' < dist/index.js > tmp.js && mv tmp.js dist/index.js
scripts.all: npm run lint && npm run prepare && npm run test

author: Daniel McConville
